WRITING.TEXT: Don't think you've lost anything yet. I see the eye gettin a bit muddy though, I would avoid overworking any areas with the colorful design you have going on, and it might be cool to see that incorporated more to the form of what your drawing. Not just in a flat way.
Yeah
Punjab, India

WRITING.TITLE: My meditation spot

WRITING.TEXT: Wowzers in my trowzers
Yeah like I said man, your the artist you don't have to listen to anyone, or even give two shits about what anyone thinks. Some will like it, some will hate it. Your not here to please others.

I don't think its something you should go back an work on, its more of something you learn from and can use in future work. And sitting at something for long periods of time can sometimes drag your work down. Take breaks and come back to it with a fresh perspective and you will see what parts need work and what is already working for the piece. Good luck

I feel its almost two different pieces of art, the girl and the drips. Even the drips on the shirt take away from the form of the figure. Of course its your own art you don't have to listen to what anyone says but I think it could have been more successful if the drips were more carefully placed. Maybe change of sizes too, if they all are huge then it doesn't really have an impact

I wasn't even under contract . It was about 69.99 the first 6 months and then I knew it would go up, it was 79.99 and then they started charging me 83.99 sometimes a bit more for no reason, it was bull
You deserve more upvotes, this thread is blowing my mind and I'm learning at the same time. Thank you
FF7 ahh what a special game
Mine too, fuck what others say

WRITING.TEXT: Almost every night, i sometimes even start singing. Sometimes its in the background sometimes its coming out of somethin I'm holding. One time i left one of my favorite songs playing before I slept and in my dream, everyone was playing that song off their phones and car radios and stuff, I was gettin mad that everyone stole my song. I kept yelling at them to turn it off and they all laughed, I woke up like holy fuck

I'm a commucation arts major:p

You should try an keep up. Vcu doing big things, making history.. why wouldn't you want to be a part of it, you DO go here... Even if you don't care too much, you get to shit on your friends from mason, etc. Last nights game was nerve-wrecking, you would figure there's a reason all these people are excited and rushing the streets. Not just for fun, but it gives us a chance to unite and celebrate, vcu doesn't really have school spirit, but when moments like this happen , it lifts everyones spirits.
